job_tasks.phrase: Ontwikkelen en implementeren van AI-gedreven oplossingen met focus op praktische toepassingen
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the development and implementation of AI solutions, indicating the creation and application of models.

job_tasks.phrase: Bouwen van prototypes en deze uitbreiden tot volwaardige toepassingen
job_tasks.justification: This describes the process of taking initial AI concepts (prototypes) and developing them into complete, functional applications, which is a core software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Ontwerpen, evalueren en verbeteren van LLM-uitvoer met geavanceerde meetmethodes
job_tasks.justification: This clearly points to the design, evaluation, and refinement of LLM outputs, which is a crucial part of model development and tuning.

job_tasks.phrase: Samenwerken met teams in een Agile/Scrum-omgeving om projecten succesvol te realiseren
job_tasks.justification: While collaborative, the context of 'realizing projects' in an Agile/Scrum environment alongside developing AI solutions points towards the software development lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: Testen en optimaliseren van AI-modellen voor nauwkeurigheid en betrouwbaarheid
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions testing and optimizing AI models, which falls under the modeling and refinement stage.

job_tasks.phrase: Presenteren en demonstreren van AI-oplossingen aan stakeholders
job_tasks.justification: Presenting solutions to stakeholders implies understanding business needs and communicating the value of the AI solutions to them.

soft_skills.phrase: Samenwerken met teams in een Agile/Scrum-omgeving
Presenteren en demonstreren van AI-oplossingen aan stakeholders

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the design, development, and implementation of applications for large language models (LLMs), including fine-tuning and optimizing LLM output. It also highlights building prototypes into full applications, which aligns perfectly with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.
